prompt: Create a simple sleeve bearing (bushing) with outer diameter 20 mm, axial length 10 mm, inner bore diameter 10 mm (through), and 45° chamfers of 1 mm on the inner and outer edges on both ends.
notes: From screenshots: Sketch1 shows Ø20.00 mm; Boss-Extrude1 depth is 10.00 mm.
Sketch2/Cut-Extrude1 shows Ø10.00 mm and cut is Through All.
Chamfer1: Distance=1 mm, Angle=45°; applied to 4 edges (inner+outer on both ends) as shown in the feature selection.
